                   /**

   * The offset commit behavior enumeration.

  public enum AckMode { 
    /**
     * æ¯å¤„ç†ä¸€æ¡commitä¸€æ¬¡

                  # MANUAL COMMIT

                  @KafkaListener(topics = "k010")
public void listen(ConsumerRecord<?, ?> cr,Acknowledgment ack) throws Exception {

        LOGGER.info(cr.toString());

        ack.acknowledge();

}
